overview: You never forget your first crush. That gorgeous guy who sits behind you in class, the ripped jock stud on the track field, the coolest dude at the party. The one you always knew was out of your league, who didn't even know you existedâ€¦ or so you thought! Sometimes teenage dreams can cum true, as five timid twinks discover their schoolboy crushes flip the script and give them 8+ inches of undivided attention! Revisit the past to fuck and fall in love all over again with the hottest young heartthrobs on this side of the schoolyard. Zane Porter, Arad, Derrick Dime, Johnny Torque, Cole Christiansen, Tyler Sky, and more star as the student bodies that your body just won't be able to resist busting your nut for. You never forget your first crush, but by the time you're through with him, neither will he! A Next Door Twink Anthology.
title: Schoolboy Crushes
